dokku.predeploy: php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate --allow-no-migration && ./node_modules/.bin/encore production && php bin/console assets:install --symlink
dokku.postdeploy: php bin/console cache:warmup --env=prod && php bin/console app:updateplayers && php bin/console app:syncfranchisedata && php bin/console app:synctradebaitdata && php bin/console app:syncassetsdata
